name: myblog
description: 1. the value of ng-app should be '', if not the ng-include can't work. 2. overflow:scroll (visible): what happened when the overflow element content box 3. add Guardfile : use Guard tool to reload the page or execute some other tasks when some special file modified 4. add Gemfile : specify which gems the project need to use . 5. after executing 'bundle install', the Gemfile.lock will be generated. The Gemfile.lock file is where Bundler records the exact versions that were installed. 6.
